attributes.action: Stop David Lammy paying reparations to the Carribean
attributes.additional_details: Because it will bankrupt the country and will put an even bigger burden on generations to come. It could also open the floodgates to more countries wanting reparations.
attributes.background: Stop reparations. We have payed enough in stopping slavery.

rejection.details:
In response to a parliamentary question on 25 February, the responding Minister outlined that the Government would not be making cash transfers and payments for slavery reparations to the Caribbean.

You can read this on Hansard, the official report of all Parliamentary debates:

https://hansard.parliament.uk/Commons/2025-02-25/debates/AE9BC1F2-C7FD-4157-A9FC-92AD7303693F/HistoricSlaveryReparations#contribution-8A398EA0-030E-4447-86CE-70D0777ADE9A
